trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> in the conditions collection and enables you to programmatically evaluate the condition.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> nella raccolta condizioni e consente di valutare a livello di codice la condizione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il nome del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> da valutare.

trans-unit.source: The actual condition definition behind a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference> is of type <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>, which is derived from <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.
trans-unit.target: La definizione della condizione effettiva sottostante <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>è di tipo <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>che deriva da <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the condition evaluates to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se la condizione restituisce <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Sets member properties based on the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> that <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref> points to.
trans-unit.target: Imposta le proprietà del membro in base il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"> </xref> che <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref> punta a.
